sentences.en: A man came round with a tray of chocolates.
sentences.cn: 一名男子端着一托盘巧克力走过来。

sentences.en: A waiter entered with a tray.
A waitress came in, carrying tea on a tray.
sentences.cn: 一名女侍者走进来, 手端放着茶的托盘.

sentences.en: He brought her breakfast in bed on a tray.
sentences.cn: 他把早餐用托盘给她送到床上。

sentences.en: He set the tray upon the table.
I watched as he got a tray and joined the queue.
sentences.cn: 我看着他拿了个托盘排起了队。

sentences.en: Letters were piled high in the tray.
Place the frozen rolls on a greased baking tray.
sentences.cn: 将冷冻的肉卷放到抹了油的烤盘上。

sentences.en: She brought in a tray heavy with elegant sandwiches, scones and cakes.
sentences.cn: 她端进来一只盘子，里面盛满了精美的三明治、烤饼和蛋糕。

sentences.en: She sent back her breakfast tray untouched.
sentences.cn: 她打发人将一盘她一口未动的早餐送回.

sentences.en: She set a tray down on the table.
She spit into the little tray of mascara and brushed it on her lashes.
sentences.cn: 她朝一小盒睫毛膏里吐了点唾沫，然后蘸了一点刷到自己的睫毛上。

sentences.en: The waiter brought drinks on a tray.
sentences.cn: 服务员用托盘端来饮料。

sentences.en: There were two glasses of champagne on the tray.
When the seedlings sprout, uncover the tray.
sentences.cn: 秧苗发芽后，就把盘子上的盖子拿掉。

trans.tran_en: a flat piece of plastic, metal, or wood, with raised edges, used for carrying things such as plates, food etc
